name: UITextRange
desc: A range of characters in a text container with a starting index and an ending index in string backing a text-entry object.

items.name: var start: UITextPosition
items.desc: The start of a range of text.

items.name: var end: UITextPosition
items.desc: The end of the range of text.

items.name: var isEmpty: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the range of text represented by the receiver is zero-length.
